name: mvp-geo-calculator
description: MVP Geo Calculator - Lambda function for geocoding addresses and calculating distances using Google Maps API

scripts.package: cd src && npm install --production && zip -r ../function.zip . && cd ..
scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file template.yaml --stack-name mvp-geo-calculator --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --no-fail-on-empty-changeset && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name mvp-geo-calculator --zip-file fileb://function.zip
